title: Emphysema: the facts
creator_credit: American Lung Association, Amram Nowak Associates and Richard Bluestein
brief_description: The function of normal lungs is shown and the processes due to cigarette smoking which affect the lung and cause emphysema. Normal lungs are shown and compared with lungs from an emphysema patient. Treatments, which can only alleviate the symptoms, are shown
